pages.text: $(li)The Snowballs can be throw to other creature right clicking while you are holding them on your hand.$(br)$(li)The most creatures will not receive any damage, except fire creatures like Blazes.$(br)$(li)They can be used to craft Snow blocks and Glowballs too.
$(li)You can obtain Snowballs mining the Snow Blocks that are located in Snow Biomes.
